Posts.Content: I lost my mom when i was 13 yrs old and i never get over that i am the only child my mom died from ovarian cancer i still miss her to this day and cry every so often it will take time and it is going to be okay i now have two beautiful children 23 and 16 yrs old so cry hon and cry some more but it is going to be okay it takes time to heal nuff love and huhs u come to the right place.
Posts.Title: What Now??
